oscar.SelectionHandler.WFSRequest

Utility class to handle selections against a Web Feature Service.  Will provide a Clear Selection button in the toolbar. oscar.SelectionHandler

Summary
oscar.SelectionHandler.WFSRequestUtility class to handle selections against a Web Feature Service.
Functions
requestFailure Process a failed loading of GML.Called by initialise() and loadUrl() if there was a problem loading GML.

Functions
